mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(pid, uid, time, atid, type, status, content, reply) VALUES(#{message.pid}, #{message.uid}, #{message.time}, #{message.atid}, #{message.type}, #{message.status}, #{message.content}, #{message.reply})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, p.id pid, p.title, u.id userid, u.nickName nickName, atu.id atUid, atu.nickName atNickName FROM message m, post p, user u, user atu WHERE m.pid = p.id AND m.uid = u.id AND m.atid = atu.id AND m.atid = #{uid} ORDER BY m.time DESC LIMIT #{page.startNumber},#{page.pageSize}
